title: Student dies after shooting outside Texas high school
description: One student was fatally shot and another injured outside a Texas high school on Monday, according to the Arlington Police Department.

title: 'Delicate balance': What does the banking crisis mean for the fight against inflation
description: The collapse of Silicon Valley Bank has thrust the financial system into distress, pulling attention away from a separate problem: sky-high inflation.

title: NYC prepared for any protests related to potential Trump indictment, mayor says
description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams said Monday he was "confident" the city is prepared for any protests related to a potential indictment of former President Trump.

title: Oath Keepers associates found guilty of conspiracy in Jan. 6 Capitol attack
description: A Washington, D.C. jury on Monday found four alleged associates of the far-right Oath Keepers militia group guilty of conspiracy

title: WATCH:  Make-A-Wish surprises child who has brain cancer with corgi puppy
description: Eleven-year-old Elijah's dream was to have his very own corgi puppy.

title: 2 teenage boys die in sledding accident on spring break trip
description: Two teenage boys on a Spring Break trip died in a sledding accident in Colorado, officials said.

title: Idaho OKs veto-proof bill to allow execution by firing squad
description: A bill that would allow Idaho to execute condemned inmates by firing squad is headed to the governor’s desk after passing the Legislature with a veto-proof majority

title: Fulton County prosecutors now seek to question Trump attorney, sources say
description: Prosecutors probing efforts to overturn the results of the 2020 election in Georgia are looking to question Trump attorney Christina Bobb, sources tell ABC News.

title: WATCH:  'Ted Lasso' cast talk mental health at White House
description: The cast of Apple TV+'s "Ted Lasso" visited the White House to discuss the importance of talking about mental health with President Joe Biden.

title: Body found, 6 missing after fire at illegal AirBnB in Canada
description: Montreal’s mayor is vowing to better regulate Airbnb in her city as the search continues for six people missingthrough a building that included Airbnb units in a historic city section where they are banned

title: Biden issues first veto, taking on new Republican Congress
description: Critics say ESG investments allocate money based on political agendas.

title: Fed was aware of Silicon Valley Bank problems more than a year before its collapse
description: The Federal Reserve cautioned Silicon Valley Bank on multiple occasions, ABC News confirmed.

title: 3 stabbed at Canadian hospital, student in custody
description: Police say a student has been arrested on suspicion of stabbing three people at a high school in Canada’s Atlantic coast city of Halifax

title: Republicans demand Manhattan DA Bragg turn over docs related to Trump investigation
description: House Republicans are targeting the Manhattan District Attorney's office as it reportedly prepares to bring charges against former President Donald Trump.

title: Jeremy Scott leaves Moschino after 10 years at fashion house
description: Jeremy Scott is stepping down as creative director of Italian luxury house Moschino after a decade of wild and wacky fashion shows and his elegant dressing of numerous celebrities

title: 3 men found guilty of killing rapper XXXTentacion
description: Dedrick Devonshay Williams, Michael Boatwright, Trayvon Newsome and Robert Allen were convicted of first-degree murder in XXXTentacion's death.

title: US sending ammunition, tanker trucks, boats to Ukraine
description: Several officials say the U.S. will announce $350 million in aid for Ukraine.

title: Former US Rep. John Jenrette, jailed in Abscam scandal, dies
description: Rep. John Jenrette was convicted in the Abscam bribery scandal in the late 1970s

title: Starbucks new CEO Laxman Narasimhan takes his seat
description: Starbucks officially has a new CEO

title: With overdoses up, states look at harsher fentanyl penalties
description: State lawmakers are responding to the deadliest overdose crisis in U.S. history.

title: American missionary held hostage for years in Niger released
description: Jeffery Woodke wasw a Christian humanitarian aid worker who was kidnapped in October 2016.

title: Prosecutors rest in sedition case against Proud Boys leaders
description: Federal prosecutors have rested their seditious conspiracy case against former Proud Boys leader Enrique Tarrio and four lieutenants charged with plotting to stop the peaceful transfer of presidential power from Donald Trump to Joe Biden after the 2020...

title: 2 students hurt in Texas school shooting, suspect arrested
description: Officials say two students have been injured in a shooting outside a Dallas-area high school and police arrested the person suspected of opening fire

title: EU pledges $1 billion for post-quake Turkey reconstruction
description: The European Commission will support Turkey with one billion euros ($1.07 billion) to help with reconstruction in the aftermath of the earthquake that devastated parts of the country and neighboring Syria last month

title: School library book bans are seen as targeting LGBTQ content
description: Longstanding disagreements about content in school libraries often focus this year on books with LGBTQ themes

title: International Red Cross says 2 kidnapped staff freed in Mali
description: The International Committee of the Red Cross says that two of its staff members were freed in Mali on Monday

title: Speaker of Czech parliament's lower house to visit Taiwan
description: The speaker of the Czech Parliament’s lower house is set to visit Taiwan to boost mutual ties, a step that has angered China

title: This is why greenhouse gas emissions continue to increase, according to new UN report
description: Greenhouse gas emissions are continuing to increase, exacerbating the challenge world leaders face in preventing the impacts of climate change to get worse.

title: China's President Xi arrives in Moscow for meeting with Putin
description: AS Chinese President Xi Jinping arrived on Monday afternoon in Moscow, he was greeted at Vnukovo airport by a Russian military band.

title: Report: 43,000 estimated dead in Somalia drought last year
description: A new report says an estimated 43,000 people died amid the longest drought on record in Somalia last year and half of them likely were children

title: Former Australian soldier to be charged with Afghan's murder
description: Police have charged the first Australian veteran for an alleged murder in Afghanistan three years after a war crime investigation found that 19 Australian special forces soldiers could face charges for illegal conduct during the conflict

title: Dentist arrested in wife's 'complex and calculated' poisoning death, police say
description: A Colorado dentist has been arrested on a charge of murder in the "complex and calculated" poisoning death of his wife, local police said on Sunday.

title: Sandler receives Mark Twain Prize, praise from comic pals
description: A host of comedic and entertainment royalty gathered Sunday night at Washington’s Kennedy Center as Adam Sandler received the Mark Twain Prize for American Humor

title: Police supervisor in Tyre Nichols’ death retired with benefits before getting fired
description: Lt. DeWayne Smith was believed to be the highest-ranking officer on the scene, according to a statement from Nichols’ family’s lawyers.

title: 2 skiers killed in large late-winter avalanches in Colorado
description: A skier has been killed in a large avalanche just outside a Colorado ski resort boundary, a day after authorities recovered the body of another avalanche victim in the state
